original_text: “Son of man, the house of Israel has become dross to me; all of them are bronze and tin and iron and lead in the furnace; they are dross of silver.
korean_text: 인자야 이스라엘 족속이 내게 찌꺼기가 되었나니 곧 풀무 불 가운데에 있는 놋이나 주석이나 쇠나 납이며 은의 찌꺼기로다

sentences.original_text: the house of Israel has become dross to me;
all of them are bronze and tin and iron and lead in the furnace;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 용광로 속의 놋과 주석과 철과 납이라,
